title: The Mistress Contract
description: When college student Madeline Swanson stumbled into the wrong job interview, I immediately wanted her…on her knees.My offer is simple–I’ll cover her tuition, living expenses and a generous shopping budget. In return, she signs a contract, making herself available at my request–on my arm or in my bed, fulfilling all my darkest desires.She says no now, but I’ll pursue her relentlessly until she signs the contract. Then, not only will I make her mine, I’ll own her…
author: Evelyn  Austin
